Responses.xmlns: Prelimine Litkit Response Tool Standard Language

Text.Primary: [Responding] [verb1] to this [Request/Interrogatory] as cumulative of prior discovery requests.
Text.Alt1: [Responding] [verb1] to [Request/Interrogatory] No. [X] as cumulative of prior discovery requests.

Text.Primary: [Responding] [verb1] to this [Request/Interrogatory] as requesting [documents that are/information that is] equally available to [Propounding].
Text.Alt1: [Responding] [verb1] to [Request/Interrogatory] No. [X] as requesting [documents that are/information that is] equally available to [Propounding].

Text.Primary: [Responding] [verb1] to this [Request/Interrogatory] as overbroad and burdensome.
Text.Alt1: [Responding] [verb1] to [Request/Interrogatory] No. [X] as overbroad and burdensome.

Text.Primary: [Responding] [verb1] to this [Request/Interrogatory] as premature to the extent it requires disclosure of contentions. Discovery is ongoing and [Responding] will supplement this Response at the appropriate time.
Text.Alt1: [Responding] [verb1] to [Request/Interrogatory] No. [X] as premature to the extent it requires disclosure of contentions. Discovery is ongoing and [Responding] will supplement this Response at the appropriate time.

Text.Primary: [Responding] [verb1] to this [Request/Interrogatory] as premature to the extent it requires disclosure of expert testimony. Discovery is ongoing and [Responding] will supplement this Response at the appropriate time.
Text.Alt1: [Responding] [verb1] to [Request/Interrogatory] No. [X] as premature to the extent it requires disclosure of expert testimony. Discovery is ongoing and [Responding] will supplement this Response at the appropriate time.

Text.Primary: [Responding] [verb1] to this [Request/Interrogatory] to the extent it requests the disclosure of attorney work product or [documents/information] protected by attorney-client privilege.
Text.Alt1: [Responding] [verb1] to [Request/Interrogatory] No. [X] to the extent it requests the disclosure of attorney work product or [documents/information] protected by attorney-client privilege.

Text.Primary: [Responding] [verb1] to this [Request/Interrogatory] to the extent it seeks [documents that are/information that is] not relevant to any party’s claim or defense, nor proportional to the needs of the case.
Text.Alt1: [Responding] [verb1] to [Request/Interrogatory] No. [X] to the extent it seeks [documents that are/information that is] not relevant to any party’s claim or defense, nor proportional to the needs of the case.

Text.Primary: [Responding] [verb1] to this [Request/Interrogatory] as requesting [documents that are/information that is] publicly available.
Text.Alt1: [Responding] [verb1] to [Request/Interrogatory] No. [X] as requesting [documents that are/information that is] that are publicly available.

Text.Primary: [Responding] [verb1] to this [Request/Interrogatory] as repetitive of prior discovery requests and directs [Propounding] to ....
Text.Alt1: [Responding] [verb1] to [Request/Interrogatory] No. [X] as repetitive of prior discovery requests and directs [Propounding] to ....

Text.Primary: As permitted by Rule 33(d) of the Federal Rules of Civil Procedure, [Responding] [verb1] [Propounding] to the following documents:
Text.Alt1: As permitted by Rule 33(d) of the Federal Rules of Civil Procedure, [Responding] [verb1] [Propounding] to the following documents:

Text.Primary: Subject to and without waiving the foregoing objections, [Responding] [verb1] that no documents will be produced in response to this Request.
Text.Alt1: Subject to and without waiving the foregoing objections, [Responding] [verb1] that no documents will be produced in response to Request No. [X].

Text.Primary: Subject to and without waiving the foregoing objections, [Responding] [verb1] that they will search and produce any responsive, non-privileged documents in its possession, custody, or control.
Admitted.
Denied.
[Responding] [verb1] the remainder of the allegations contained in [Paragraph/Request] No. [X].
Text.Alt1: [Responding] [verb1] the remainder of the allegations contained in this [Paragraph/Request].
Text.Alt2: The remaining allegations in [Paragraph/Request] No. [X] are denied.

Text.Primary: [Responding] hereby [verb1] the responses from the preceding paragraphs.
[Responding] [verb1] knowledge or information sufficient to form a belief about the truth of the allegations contained in this [Paragraph/Request].
Text.Alt1: [Responding] [verb1] knowledge or information sufficient to form a belief about the truth of the allegations contained in [Paragraph/Request] No. [X].

Text.Primary: [Paragraph/Request] No. [X] contains legal conclusions to which no answer is necessary.
Text.Alt1: This [Paragraph/Request] contains legal allegations to which no answer is necessary

Text.Primary: [Responding] [verb1] that [Paragraph/Request] No. [X] accurately quotes a document, but [verb2] any characterization of the document and [verb3] that the document speaks for itself.
Subject to and without waiving the foregoing objections, [Responding] [verb1] ...
